name: A Drag And Drop Puzzle For Toddlers
name_original: A Drag And Drop Puzzle For Toddlers
description:
Your Toddler is about to undertake a journey through the life of young kids, normal families and everyday scenes.

In the course of up to 15 scenarios, your Child will playfully get to know everything about the normal life and will thus train his- or her- gift of imagination, intellect, skills and combination capacities.
